name: Ajinomoto Animal Nutrition Europe
goal: Ajinomoto is originally a Japan based company, leader in the development of amino acid production technologies and applications. Its subsidiary Ajinomoto Animal Nutrition Europe, based in France, is specialised in the production of amino acids for animal nutrition and involved in researchon animal nutrition
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
